p: One of the biggest challenges of applying polysaccharides to films for food packaging is high sensitivity to water [ 70]. The value of the contact angle allows monitoring the hydrophilic and hydrophobic character of the film surface therefore, the contact angle increases according to the hydrophobicity of the surface [ 71]. Hydrophilic surfaces have contact angle values of <20°, while hydrophobic surfaces have values of >70° [ 52].
